resources.string: When you envision your goal, what color immediately comes to mind?
Envision what inspires you on the path to achieving your goal. What color is your inspiration?
You achieve your goal while maintaining life balance. Your life is filled in all aspects. What color represents the harmony of your life?
When you recall this event, what color immediately comes to mind?
Were there other people there? What color were their clothes?
What do you want to create?
As a rule, the first answer is usually the most correct. Do not dwell on the questions for too long, try to visualize. Colors may repeat. Do not think about combinations, just choose what you like.
How would you characterize this event:
